data.title: Attack A Main Saturate Dash Play
data.description: At the start of the round, throw your Saturate to deny Defenders from getting an early angle towards A Main and capitalize on the utility with your dash for a favorable fight.

data.title: B Backsite Dash + Refract Execute
data.description: Quickly contest Defenders towards backsite with this setup, allowing you to also clear anyone playing behind Screens.

data.title: Art to A Dash Refract Split
data.description: When splitting the A Site, use this setup to blitz your way into a fast angle and take the site.

data.title: A Site to Pit Dash Refract Execute
data.description: Use this simple, but effective Light Speed lineup to contest Defenders from an aggressive angle behind them.
